wikipedia_page.main: Johnny Urquhart (3 February 1925 – 16 December 2008) was a Scottish football player and administrator. He played for Heart of Midlothian, Raith Rovers and once played for the Scottish League XI. After retiring as a player in the early 1960s, Urquhart served Raith Rovers in several roles, including coach, scout, director, chairman and president.
